address: 1999 Mont-Royal Ave E, Montreal, Quebec H2H 1J4, Canada

story.heading: New Indian restaurant in town serving delicious mouth watering unique flavours of India Vegan, vegetarian and non-vegetarian options available. Customizable according to customer requests or allergies. Take-out and dine-in.
story.content: The food at Flavors of India Dining is the kind that many of us at the restaurant grew up enjoying. The clay-oven-cooked meats and vegetables from our tandoor, the exotic seasonings in our masala and vindaloo dishes, the fragrant soups and biryanis. Everything, right down to the chai and kulfi that may finish your meal are served with the same care and attention as a home-cooked meal.
story.contactUsPara: We are open for dine-in, takeout, and delivery and look forward to serving you.
story.blogPara1: Chilli Paneer, a beloved dish tantalizing taste buds with its fiery kick and succulent texture, has become a staple in the culinary landscape, particularly in the Indian subcontinent. This delectable creation finds its roots in the fascinating fusion of Indian and Chinese cuisines, showcasing the culinary diversity that arises when two rich culinary traditions come together.
story.blogPara2: Chicken Biryani, a fragrant and flavorful dish that has captured the hearts and taste buds of millions, boasts a rich and diverse heritage that spans centuries. While the exact origin of this beloved dish is a subject of debate among culinary historians, one thing is certain: chicken biryani has evolved into a cultural icon cherished across the Indian subcontinent and beyond.
story.blogPara3: Embarking on a culinary journey doesn't always require an extensive list of ingredients and hours spent in the kitchen. Sometimes, all it takes is a handful of key components to create a dish that delights the taste buds and transports you to distant lands.
story.blogPara4: Dal Makhani, a quintessential North Indian dish, has won hearts around the globe with its rich, creamy texture and aromatic blend of spices. While the traditional recipe boasts a symphony of flavors, the judicious use of flavor enhancers can take this dish to new culinary heights.
story.blogPara5: Few culinary experiences rival the comforting aroma of a simmering pot of tomato soup on a chilly day. Yet, the success of this classic dish often hinges on a crucial decision: the choice of tomatoes. With a plethora of varieties available, selecting the right tomatoes can elevate your soup from ordinary to extraordinary.

reservation.heading: Visit us for A Royal Dining Experience
reservation.subheading: AMBIANCE TO COMPLEMENT THE ROYAL MEAL
